column4: Just installed ubuntu on my sister's laptop, I need help with 2 things.
Ok, so, no minimize, close, maximize + borders on the windows.  When I go to window under system -> window then it pops up a box that it can't configure unknown.
I don't know how to fix it.
Ok, so, no minimize, close, maximize + borders on the windows.  When I go to window under system -> window then it pops up a box that it can't configure unknown. and I can't fix it, please help :(
Ok, so, no minimize, close, maximize + borders on the windows.  When I go to window under system -> window then it pops up a box that it can't configure unknown. and I can't fix it, please help :(
I don't think so, but I'll check synaptic.
load emerald and it's supporting files using synaptic package manager.
and tell us if that all works
if you install fusion-icon you can tell the system what window decorator to use.  so you can tell it to use metacity
tell it to use metacity as your window manager.  and it will shift back to metacity's window decorator.
ther was no fusion-icon when I searched in synaptic, but there is a compiz-fusion...
it isn't in synaptic.  go to google and search for fusion-icon install in gutsy
